<i class='icon-bullhorn'></i> Magics Ale.desc: The City of Barberton has begun using Nixle to provide community notifications. This service will help the City communicate electronically with the citizens in a timely manner. For more information and to sign up, please visit the community notifications page.

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed.desc: City offices will be closed Monday, November 11 in observance of Veterans Day
City offices will be closed Thursday, November 28 and Friday November 29 in observance of Thanksgiving

<i class='icon-lightbulb'></i> Park Ligh.desc:
The Christmas walk and lighting of Lake Anna Park will be on Saturday November 30 from 4 to 9 PM.

4-5PM Pre-lighting activities in Downtown & Lake Anna area
5-6PM Lake Anna Gazebo activities
6-9PM Christmas walk activities

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed.desc: City offices will be closed Tuesday, December 24 and Wenesday December 25 in observance of Christmas

Change for Change.desc:
This month's Change for Change we be held at the Barberton Moose. Funds will be donated to Mobile Meals
October 31, 4:30-7:00

<i class='icon-warning-sign'></i> Road C.desc:
To allow CSX Railroad to perform routine maintenance on tracks at Snyder and Fairview Ave., the following road closures will begin mid-morning on Monday, October 28 and will continue through Wednesday, October 30.

Barricades will be placed at:
Snyder & 2nd Street
Snyder and South Van Buren
Fairview & North Van Buren
Fairview & Coventry
Fairview at the Metro Park Trail
